reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress comfortable, soft, and warm, with one mentioning it pairs well with fleece leggings.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress!
items.body: OMG!! This is my new FAVORITE dress!! I was worried it would be cheap feeling and too thin, but no! Its perfect! Not too heavy to be bulky and not to thin, just average sweater weight. Not itchy or overly soft...just think sweater. I got an xl per the size guide. Its a little loose and I probably could size down for a more fitted feel, but I really like the slightly loose fit. So cozy for a cold office (if ya know, ya know) I'm 5'2" and about 165lbs, it falls just above my knees. Sleeves are on the longer side, but they cuff well. I will definitely be buying more in different colors!! Read more
items.author: Jess S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish
items.body: Cute! Fits great, seems true to size to me. Seems like a nice soft material with adequate stretch. Read more
items.author: Chloe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value!
items.body: Very comfortable and quality knit. Mid-heavy knit. Wore it to a Christmas party where we went out in the snow after and was warm and cozy coupled with fleece leggings. Read more
items.author: Jennifer McMullen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is for smaller girls
items.body: The quality is nice. It’s fine for fall. In winter you will need leggings and a jacket. The length and color is as shown on the image they provided. The fit isn’t great on curvy gals. I look like I am wearing a potato sack. It just isn’t flattering. I let my daughter have it and it looks great on her. It is not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Zombiegirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Fits perfectly! I am a size 8 to 10 in jeans and a med/lg top. Size M fit great! Not thin at all and looks just like the picture. Read more
items.author: Henry

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Nice dress, don’t look or feel anything like the picture. It was a nice dress, just not what I wanted or was looking for. Read more
items.author: Sarah Pelletier

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Nice material and nice fit Read more
items.author: Joy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 98-camel, 99-white, 0-green, 98-white Black, 0-khaki, 99-dusty Purple, 0-black, 0-red, 99-navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
